hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash cd /var/jenkins_home git init git config --global user.email "bucksnbuccos@gmail.com" git config --global user.name "Nick Sansone" echo '**' > .gitignore echo '!**/*.xml' >> .gitignore echo '!jobs' >> .gitignore echo 'jobs/*' >> .gitignore echo '!jobs/*/' >> .gitignore echo 'jobs/*/*' >> .gitignore echo '!jobs/*/*.xml' >> .gitignore git add -A git status git commit -m "committing contents of jenkins_home at $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" git remote set-url origin "https://github.com/bucksnbucs/jenkins-repo.git" git remote -v git pull origin master git push -u origin master
